info.name: YouTube - Flat Design Input Dark Theme
info.description:
This input is only good for Youtube Dark Theme.
Light Theme Link - https://userstyles.org/styles/163082/youtube-flat-design-input-light-theme
ATTENTION: There has been a cool color update go to line: 6 to change the color ;)
info.additionalInfo: New release note: Man this site sure is... BOUNCY! The YouTube logo and every icon now has a fancy new bounce animation to them! Also the videos thumbnails have a nice cozy zoom on them when you hover! ATTENTION: There has been a cool color update go to line: 6 to change the color ;)
